class ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xmlEV_RAW_IMAGE_DATA

feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_make../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_makemake (a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Create an array which has a_width -- * a_height * 4 items. require a_width_positive: a_width > 0 a_height_positive: a_height > 0 do ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_heightheight := a_height ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth := a_width Falsemake_filled ({FalseNATURAL_8} 0, 1, ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_heightheight * ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth * 4) ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_initialize_alphainitialize_alpha ensure new_count: Falsecount = ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_heightheight * ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth * 4 end
f_make_with_alpha_zero../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_make_with_alpha_zeromake_with_alpha_zero (a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Create an array which has a_width -- * a_height * 4 items. require a_width_positive: a_width > 0 a_height_positive: a_height > 0 do ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_heightheight := a_height ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth := a_width Falsemake_filled ({FalseNATURAL_8} 0, 1, ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_heightheight * ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth * 4) ensure new_count: Falsecount = ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_heightheight * ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth * 4 end
f_initialize_alpha../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_initialize_alphainitialize_alpha -- Make each alpha entry have value 255. local i, j: FalseINTEGER_32 c: FalseNATURAL_8 do from i := 4 j := 255 c := j.Falseto_natural_8 until i > Falsecount loop Falsearray_put (c, i) i := i + 4 end end
feature -- Measurement
f_height../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_heightheight: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Number of rows.
f_width../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Number of columns.
feature -- Access
f_originating_pixmap../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_originating_pixmaporiginating_pixmap: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap Current was based on, if any.
f_rgb_hex_representation../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_rgb_hex_representationrgb_hex_representation: FalseSTRING_8 -- Returns a string of hex codes representing the RGB values -- of all the pixels in pixmap. local i: FalseINTEGER_32 do from Result := "" Result.Falseappend_character (../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_hex_codehex_code (Falsearray_item (1) |>> 4)) Result.Falseappend_character (../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_hex_codehex_code (Falsearray_item (1) \\ 16)) i := 2 until i = Falsecount + 1 loop if i \\ 4 /= 0 then Result.Falseappend_character (../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_hex_codehex_code (Falsearray_item (i) |>> 4)) Result.Falseappend_character (../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_hex_codehex_code (Falsearray_item (i) \\ 16)) end i := i + 1 end end
f_pixel../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_pixelpixel (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32): ../interface/ev_color.xmlEV_COLOR require valid_coordinates: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y) local a_red, a_green, a_blue: FalseNATURAL_8 do a_red := ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_pixel_red_componentpixel_red_component (a_x, a_y) a_green := ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_pixel_green_componentpixel_green_component (a_x, a_y) a_blue := ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_pixel_blue_componentpixel_blue_component (a_x, a_y) create Result.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_make_with_8_bit_rgbmake_with_8_bit_rgb (a_red.Falseto_integer_32, a_green.Falseto_integer_32, a_blue.Falseto_integer_32) end
f_pixel_red_component../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_pixel_red_componentpixel_red_component (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseNATURAL_8 require valid_coordinates: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y) do Result := ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_get_value_from_positionget_value_from_position (a_x, a_y, 1) end
f_pixel_green_component../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_pixel_green_componentpixel_green_component (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseNATURAL_8 require valid_coordinates: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y) do Result := ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_get_value_from_positionget_value_from_position (a_x, a_y, 2) end
f_pixel_blue_component../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_pixel_blue_componentpixel_blue_component (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseNATURAL_8 require valid_coordinates: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y) do Result := ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_get_value_from_positionget_value_from_position (a_x, a_y, 3) end
f_pixel_alpha_component../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_pixel_alpha_componentpixel_alpha_component (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseNATURAL_8 require valid_coordinates: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y) do Result := ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_get_value_from_positionget_value_from_position (a_x, a_y, 4) end
feature -- Element Change
f_set_pixel../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_pixelset_pixel (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32; a_color: ../interface/ev_color.xmlEV_COLOR) require valid_coordinates: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y) a_color_not_void: a_color /= Void do ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_value_from_integerset_value_from_integer (a_x, a_y, 1, a_color.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_red_8_bitred_8_bit.Falseto_natural_8) ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_value_from_integerset_value_from_integer (a_x, a_y, 2, a_color.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_green_8_bitgreen_8_bit.Falseto_natural_8) ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_value_from_integerset_value_from_integer (a_x, a_y, 3, a_color.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blue_8_bitblue_8_bit.Falseto_natural_8) end
f_set_pixel_red_component../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_pixel_red_componentset_pixel_red_component (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32; a_intensity: FalseNATURAL_8) require valid_coordinates: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y) do ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_value_from_integerset_value_from_integer (a_x, a_y, 1, a_intensity) end
f_set_pixel_green_component../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_pixel_green_componentset_pixel_green_component (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32; a_intensity: FalseNATURAL_8) require valid_coordinates: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y) do ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_value_from_integerset_value_from_integer (a_x, a_y, 2, a_intensity) end
f_set_pixel_blue_component../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_pixel_blue_componentset_pixel_blue_component (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32; a_intensity: FalseNATURAL_8) require valid_coordinates: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y) do ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_value_from_integerset_value_from_integer (a_x, a_y, 3, a_intensity) end
f_set_pixel_alpha_component../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_pixel_alpha_componentset_pixel_alpha_component (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32; a_intensity: FalseNATURAL_8) require valid_coordinates: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y) do ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_value_from_integerset_value_from_integer (a_x, a_y, 4, a_intensity) end
feature -- Contract support
f_valid_coordinates../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_valid_coordinatesvalid_coordinates (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseBOOLEAN do Result := (a_x >= 1 and then a_x <= ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth and then a_y >= 1 and then a_y <= ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_heightheight) end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_drawable_action_sequences_i.xmlEV_DRAWABLE_ACTION_SEQUENCES_I} -- Implementation
f_set_originating_pixmap../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_originating_pixmapset_originating_pixmap (a_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP) -- Sets ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_originating_pixmaporiginating_pixmap to a_pixmap. do ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_originating_pixmaporiginating_pixmap := a_pixmap end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_set_value_from_integer../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_set_value_from_integerset_value_from_integer (a_x, a_y, a_pos: FalseINTEGER_32; a_value: FalseNATURAL_8) require a_x_positive: a_x > 0 a_y_positive: a_y > 0 a_pos_in_range: a_pos >= 1 and a_pos <= 4 local array_pos: FalseINTEGER_32 do array_pos := ((a_y - 1) * 4 * ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth) + ((a_x - 1) * 4) + a_pos Falsearray_put (a_value, array_pos) end
f_get_value_from_position../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_get_value_from_positionget_value_from_position (a_x, a_y, a_pos: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseNATURAL_8 local array_pos: FalseINTEGER_32 do array_pos := ((a_y - 1) * 4 * ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth) + ((a_x - 1) * 4) + a_pos Result := Falsearray_item (array_pos) end
f_hex_code../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_hex_codehex_code (a_code: FalseNATURAL_8): FalseCHARACTER_8 require valid_code: a_code >= 0 and a_code <= 15 do if a_code < 10 then Result := (a_code + 48).Falseto_character_8 else Result := (a_code + 55).Falseto_character_8 end end
invariant items_number: Falsecount = ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_widthwidth * ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xml#f_heightheight * 4
